descriptions.title: Exorcism of Spirits
descriptions.content:
Related Terms

gdon bgegs bzlog pa, bdud bzlog, gdon sgrol, [dam] sri bzlog pa, sri mnan etc. See also Exorcism/Rituals for subjugation.

Example Texts

  • Gdon bgegs bzlog thabs 
  • Sher snying bdud bzlog dang glud rdzong 
  • Thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel gyi las tshogs sri'i bar chad bsrung bzlog gi rim pa gnam lcags ur mo 
  • Thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel las gdon bgegs bskrad cing byin rlabs bya tshul khro chung thog 'bebs 
  • Khyim pa la phan pa sgrub pa'i yan lag dang po gdon chen bco lnga zhi bar byed pa'i thabs 'chi med bdud rtsi'i bum bzang (For householders)
  • Sri ngan gdon bgegs mnan pa’i cho ga
